mapper.insert: insert into t_account_log (trade_no, pk_value, type, amount, gmt_time, info, tx_id, action_id, status, timestamp) values (#{tradeNo}, #{pkValue}, #{type}, #{amount}, #{gmtTime}, #{info}, #{txId}, #{actionId}, #{status}, #{timestamp})
mapper.select: select trade_no tradeNo, pk_value pkValue, type, amount, gmt_time gmtTime, info, tx_id, action_id, status, timestamp from t_account_log where pk_value = #{pkValue} and type = #{type}
select trade_no tradeNo, pk_value pkValue, type, amount, gmt_time gmtTime, info, tx_id, action_id, status, timestamp from t_account_log where pk_value = #{pk} and status = #{status}
select trade_no tradeNo, pk_value pkValue, type, amount, gmt_time gmtTime, info, tx_id txId, action_id actionId, status, timestamp from t_account_log where tx_id = #{txId}
